channel.title: tidytuesday on R que R
channel.description: Recent content in tidytuesday on R que R

item.title: Food consumption and CO2 emissions due to food products (tidytuesday contribution)
item.description:
Re In this post, intented to be a small contribution to the tidytuesday project, we will use the package {echarts4r} to visualizate in a map the food consumption and CO2 emissions from 130 countries.
Intro This short post is going to be my first and small contribution to Tidytuesday project.
